question: Which one of the following films was not directed by Satyajit Ray?
explanation: Satyajit Ray was an Indian filmmaker who worked prominently in Bengali cinema and who has made his directorial debut in 1955 with Pather Panchali and directed 36 films like Jalsaghar, Agantuk, Sadgati, Shatranj Ke Khilari, Charulata, etc.Gumnaam is a 1965 Bollywood thriller film, directed by Raja Nawathe.
